summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of PBX Major UI/UX Overhaul completed. All 13 features tested successfully. Dark theme for marketing pages (/, /pricing), light theme for app pages (/app/*), new Remitly-style progressive onboarding at /welcome, 4-tab navigation (Home, Send, Activity, Manage), and complete Send Money flow all working correctly.

landing_page_dark_theme.details: Landing page uses dark theme (bg-neutral-950 = rgb(10,10,10)), gold/amber headers (rgb(251,191,36)), red CTAs (rgb(220,38,38)). Hero Get Started and Nav Get Started buttons found.

pricing_page_dark_theme.details: Pricing page uses dark theme (rgb(10,10,10)). All 4 plan cards displayed (Basic, Premium, SME, Enterprise). PHP pricing shown (₱499/mo, ₱2,499/mo).

welcome_onboarding_flow.details: New Remitly-style progressive onboarding at /welcome works correctly. 6 steps: Welcome carousel → Corridor selection → Signup → Account Type → Phone OTP → Complete. Light theme (rgb(248,249,250)).

app_home_light_theme.details: App pages use light theme (bg-[#F8F9FA] = rgb(248,249,250)). Home tab shows live FX rate card with current rate and 'Send Money Now' CTA button.

four_tab_navigation.details: App Shell has 4-tab bottom navigation: Home, Send, Activity, Manage. All tabs have data-testid attributes (nav-home, nav-send, nav-activity, nav-manage).

send_flow_step1_amount.details: Step 1 - Amount entry with USD/PHP conversion. Shows 'You send' (USD) and 'They receive' (PHP) with live FX rate. Continue button works.

send_flow_step2_recipient.details: Step 2 - Recipient selection. 'Add new recipient' button works. Delivery methods: GCash, Maya, Bank Deposit, Cash Pickup. Form fields for name and phone/account.

send_flow_step3_payment.details: Step 3 - Payment method selection. Options: Bank Account (Best badge, triggers Plaid), Debit Card, Credit Card (+2.9% fee), Apple Pay (Fast badge).

send_flow_plaid_prompt.details: Bank Account option triggers Plaid prompt 'Connect your bank' with benefits listed. Connect Bank button works.

send_flow_step4_review.details: Step 4 - Review screen with summary card showing recipient receives amount, rate, ETA, and 'No fees'. Collapsible sections for recipient and payment. Send button works.

send_flow_step5_confirmation.details: Step 5 - Confirmation screen shows 'Transfer sent!' with amount, status (Processing), and ETA. 'Send again' and 'Go to Home' buttons available.

activity_tab.details: Activity tab shows transfer history. Empty state 'No transfers yet' displayed for new users. Transfer items show recipient, amount, status, and date.

manage_tab.details: Manage tab shows Profile, Payment Methods, Recipients, Security, Legal menu items. Sign out button available. User profile header with avatar and email.

full_user_journey.details: Complete flow tested: Landing → Get Started → Welcome → Corridor → Signup → Account Type → Phone OTP → Complete → Home → Send Money → Amount → Recipient → Payment → Review → Confirmation. All steps work correctly.

critical_code_review_comments: All APIs are MOCKED - no backend integration. Uses mockApi.js for getQuote, lockRate, createTransfer, etc.
Session management uses React Context (SessionContext.jsx) with sessionStorage
FX rates are simulated with random fluctuation around BASE_RATE (56.25)
Transfers and recipients are stored in localStorage
Plaid integration is mocked - clicking 'Connect Bank' just proceeds to next step
Good use of data-testid attributes throughout for testing
test_credentials: No credentials needed - all flows are mocked. Any email and 6-digit OTP works.
seed_data_creation: None - uses mock data from mockApi.js and localStorage
context_for_next_testing_agent: Major UI/UX overhaul verified: Dark theme for marketing (/, /pricing), light theme for app (/app/*). New onboarding at /welcome with 6 progressive steps. 4-tab navigation (Home, Send, Activity, Manage). Complete Send Money flow with 5 steps (Amount → Recipient → Payment → Review → Confirmation). Plaid prompt shown for bank accounts. All APIs are MOCKED using mockApi.js.
